1_flux2_klein_9b.notes: 5/7 pass. GPU processes successfully (HTTP 200, node_errors:{}). 40s total (cold start + inference). Images exist on serverless container but never fetched.

bugs_found.title: Image delivery gap â€” QM never fetches generated images from serverless
bugs_found.root_cause: submit_to_serverless() only POSTs /prompt, never fetches /api/history/{prompt_id} or /api/view to get actual images
bugs_found.evidence: Console shows job completed with node_errors:{}, but no image appears in UI. Serverless response only has prompt_id/number metadata.
bugs_found.proposed_fix: After getting prompt_id from serverless, QM should: 1) GET /api/history/{prompt_id} to find image filenames, 2) GET /api/view?filename=...&type=output to download images, 3) Save to user output dir or return base64 in response

fixes_applied: redirect.js: status banner for GPU progress feedback (PR #14)
known_issues: IMAGE DELIVERY GAP: serverless GPU generates images but they stay on the remote container.
WebSocket: no bridge to serverless container.
Queue history empty: local ComfyUI unaware of serverless jobs.
